elements.name: mentor-card
elements.description: Use the MentorCard component to display a mentor's project information with a cover image, title, and relevant tags for technologies used.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: The title of the mentor card, displayed as the card's header.

attributes.name: cover
attributes.description: The URL of the cover image to be displayed on the card.

attributes.name: live
attributes.description: The URL of the live version of the mentor's work. Clicking the cover image will open this URL.

attributes.name: solution
attributes.description: The URL of the solution or detailed version of the mentor's work. Clicking the title will open this URL.

attributes.name: html
attributes.description: Indicates if the mentor's work includes HTML.

attributes.name: css
attributes.description: Indicates if the mentor's work includes CSS.

attributes.name: js
attributes.description: Indicates if the mentor's work includes JavaScript.

attributes.name: tailwind
attributes.description: Indicates if the mentor's work includes Tailwind CSS.
